channel.title: Need help with commands and codes please help!(new at this)
channel.description: i need help coding and commands with my sever please help me :confused:

item.title: Need help with commands and codes please help!(new at this)
item.dc:creator: @JBJr JBJr
item.description:
@JBJr wrote:

Heres pretty much anything you need to know on commands =)

Find this in client.java:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase

These are the commands you want to edit to make skill xp, items, and teleport commands.
Put these codes under

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase

This, to make skill xp commands:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("COMMANDHERE") && (playerRights >= 3)) { addSkillXP(14000000, 0); addSkillXP(14000000, 1); addSkillXP(14000000, 2); addSkillXP(14000000, 3); addSkillXP(14000000, 4); addSkillXP(14000000, 5); addSkillXP(14000000, 6); sendMessage("YOURMESSAGEHERE"); }

This, to add items:

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("COMMANDHERE") && playerRights >= 2) { addItem(CODEHERE,AMOUNTHERE); addItem(CODEHERE,AMOUNTHERE); addItem(CODEHERE,AMOUNTHERE); addItem(CODEHERE,AMOUNTHERE); }

And, this, to add teleport commands.

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("COMMANDHERE")) && playerRights = 0) { teleportToX = COORDSHERE; teleportToY = COORDSHERE; heightLevel = 0; MainHelpMenu(); sendMessage("YOURMESSAGEHERE"); }

Edit these codes to however you like.
Now, when you see the

playerRights >= 2)

in the item and xp command, thats what lvl of player that can use this command. Most of you should know this:
0 = Regular Player
1 = Moderator
2 = Admin
3 = Owner/Co-owner

Just change the number for whoever you want to use it.

This should be pretty easy.
Save, compile, run, and enjoy your new commands.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with commands and codes please help!(new at this)
